title: ai16z Eliza (2024-12-18)
overview: Development focused on package improvements (client null), new features (unruggable), 6 bug fixes. with 22 contributors merging 14 PRs. Major work included various improvements.
issues_summary: working on 2 bugs including 'DTS Build error', ' Error when starting Eliza agent: "fs.Stats constructor is deprecated" and "triggerUncaughtException"' and implementing 1 feature requests including 'way for bots to have cool down periods (dynamic tempature adjusts) & only direct reply setting'

top_contributors.name: lalalune
top_contributors.summary: Lalalune is actively merging pull requests, focusing primarily on improving the Twitter client functionality, fixing memory manager registration issues for runtime passed to constructors, and addressing tweet truncation problems

top_contributors.name: ponderingdemocritus
top_contributors.summary: Ponderingdemocritus is actively improving their project by merging pull requests for bug fixes, enhancing logging, formatting code, and making the client more robust against null values

top_contributors.name: bmgalego
top_contributors.summary: Bmgalego is actively developing the Farcaster Client feature, as evidenced by a merged pull request
